metadata.title: Easy Tomato Chutney | South Indian Recipe | Enjoy With Dosa & Idli
metadata.description: South Indian Tomato Chutney- best tasting chutney. Recipe includes shallots, garlic, tomatoes, spices, tempering with dals, tamarind extract and curry leaves. Served with dosa, idli or appam.

en: [00:00:00.000] South Indian style tomato chutney there are many variations this is my favorite
[00:00:04.000] let's make it to hot pan adding coconut oil shallots garlic chopped cumin seeds
[00:00:09.000] saute for a few minutes adding chopped tomatoes cook it for a few minutes
[00:00:12.000] let's add chili powder salt cook it for a couple of minutes
[00:00:15.000] let it cool down and grind this to a smooth paste
[00:00:18.000] add some water grind it well
[00:00:20.000] to another hot pan adding coconut oil mustard seeds let them splatter
[00:00:22.000] chana dal urad dal dried red chillies curry leaves
[00:00:26.000] pour the tomato paste add some water to thin it down
[00:00:28.000] adding tamarind extract salt cook it for a few minutes
[00:00:32.000] here's our delicious South Indian style tomato chutney
[00:00:35.000] enjoy this with dosas idlis and filter coffee
[00:00:38.000] so comforting easy to make give it a try and thanks for watching
